item.title: 2 shot, 1 dead, at University of New Mexico in Albuquerque, suspect at large
item.description: Two people were shot at a student housing complex at the University of Mexico in Albuquerque early Friday.

item.title: 'Real hell': Venezuelan men allege physical and psychological abuse at CECOT

item.title: WATCH: Trailer home swept away by floodwaters in New Mexico
item.description: A home was swept away by floodwaters in New Mexico on Thursday as storm water rushed off mountainsides that have been scarred by wildfire.
